Ok, finally downloaded.

The video is rather good for the first 36 minutes, though not the best I've seen it. The rest of the movie is from a cam, it's alright, perhaps a bit better than the Spanish cam if you ignore the timing watermark and don't mind that it's a little darker.

The audio goes off sync a few times and skips here and there, but at least the minutes between 36 and 44 are somewhat synced this time. And there's minimal background noise, as well.

As far as I can tell nothing was cut out, the video ends just as the credits start coming up.

It's a bit better than the previous files, but I'll still be waiting for something with better quality.
perhaps the missing 15 minutes is 00:36::14 that is where the video picks up the watermark and the audio turns almost inaudible

I have to commend you! Some really great work has been done to this- Im not sure what is up with the black bar in the lower right hand corner, but the sound has been fixed (new source?) along with very good work to the cam video. a:6 v:5. I just saw it in theaters, and it was great! Anyway, enjoy the movie!
